Package com.intergalactic_fighters

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.intergalactic_fighters.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class of the player and also a parent class of the enemies.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, int x, int y, int width, int height)

      The constuctor creates a Player and set the image. Default HP is 100, and default bulletspeed is 7.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player ship (for multiplayer)
      x - the starting position on x axis
      y - the starting position on y axis
      width - the width of the ship in pixels
      height - the height of the ship in pixels

  • Method Details

    • getBulletSpeed

      public double getBulletSpeed()

      Getter of the bullet speed

      Returns:
      bullet speed = how much pixels move per frame

    • loseHp

      public void loseHp​(int points)

      Lose X number of health point

      Parameters:
      points - how much hp lose

    • getHp

      public int getHp()

      Getter of the helthpoints

      Returns:
      the HP. If HP bellow 0, it return with 0

    • isIsDead

      public boolean isIsDead()

      Check if the player is dead

      Returns:
      if dead

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g, double zoomLevel, int Xoffset, int Yoffset)

      This method draws the player and it bullets

      Parameters:
      g - is a Graphics see Graphics
      zoomLevel - how much the screen zoomed
      Xoffset - offset in x axis
      Yoffset - offset in y axis

    • setCooldown

      public void setCooldown​(int cooldown)

      Setter of the collected powerup label cooldown. Literaly how many frames it will be visible.

      Parameters:
      cooldown - collected powerup cooldown

    • inBox

      public boolean inBox​(int x0, int y0)

      Check if the player is touching a point

      Parameters:
      x0 - the x coordinate of the point
      y0 - the y coordinate of the point
      Returns:
      if the player coordinates in a box
